reviews.review:
The game is pretty... beautiful!
God bless the authors!

数年前にニコニコ動画で流行ってた気がするけどそれだけあってかなり面白い。
こちらは無印とは違い協力プレイもできるので、セールの時に抱きわせのやつが安いから是非。ただ、協力プレイは名前をローマ字にしないとよくわからんバグで落ちる。これ知らないと協力プレイに入る前に険悪なムードを作りかねない。
Best storyline everrrr, so atmospheric, love the humour, really makes you feel like an insignificant test subject. "Better then average" - IGN, 10,5/10        7/5 would recommend again.
Really fun, good graphics and a good story with a good ending.
Cinématique solo accrochante et mode coopération super bien concu, et j'apprécie le mode multijoueur en local
One of the best if not the best single player games ever made
Чувствуете себя с другом полными идиотами, когда не можете пройти легчайший уровень за пол часа.

This game is one off the best I've played in a while, the atmosphere and personality of the game is some of the best I've seen and the whole game is made with care. Valve put a lot of hard work into this game and I recommend you play it. The comedy is the best I've seen from a game of this genre. 0/10 Needs more Space Core
Best puzzle video game i've ever played! (and the only one)
KIEDY TO PISZE TO JEST 13:24   UKOŃCZYŁEM GRE NA 100% POLECAM FAJNA FABUŁA
Probably the only game that has always managed to make me shiver from its MAJESTY and BEAUTY, this is not a game, it's all.

L'histoire du jeux est vraiment intéressante pour connaitre l'histoire en détails avec toutes les infos il faut regarder sur youtube mais le mécanisme de jeux aussi est intéréssant il n'est pas obligé de jouer au 1 pour jouer mais il aide a comprendre le portal 1 est vraiment pas long il sert en quelque sortes de didactitiel mais c'est le 2 l'histoire, l'humour est vraiment bien fait dans le jeux les dialogues sont excellent ( pour voir un gameplay du jeux riche et marrant je vous recommande celui de "superbriochhe666" )
Not sure if this is the best game ever created...at least top 3. Everything about it is awesome even now, in 2020. If you're looking for a masterpiece then..this is the right game!
if you like portals good game for you and if you like adventure and puzzel good game
the level creator is very fun to mess around with

I don't know what else I can say about this game that others already haven't. Its a classic, its not overcomplicated, and its funny. Its an amazing game that every PC gamer should have in their library,

Игра суперская, прокачивает вашу способность продумывать будущие действия, видеть мелочи, искать альтернативу и т. п. Но это не так классно по мне как создавать свои собственные тесты! Суперская игра, надеюсь продолжение будет! Всем советую!
This game is literally just godly nothing else to say

Desert island game

Great atmosphere and storytelling

its pretty lit 
not gonna lie
Valve did a great job here, just think... Portal 3
전 빡대가리년이라ㅜ이런 거 못하겠네요 뭐 이리 어렵누

Very nice. Packs a bit of a challenge in the test chambers which makes it fun and satisfying to complete a test chamber. The story is amazing, the graphics are great, and i overall love this game so much! can't wait for portal 3! (that is if it ever comes out)

This game, it's AMAZING! The gameplay, fluid. The story, entrancing. The humor, hilarious! This game had an ARG involved with it, before the game was even released. This is a great way to give your product a good reputation from the get-go. The soundtrack is awesome, ranging from droning harmonics, to techno worthy of the clubs. The Co-op might not have many players, but if you can grab a friend or sibling, it's well worth it.

My only complaint is that the maps aren't compatible with Garry's Mod, but that's Garry's Mod.

Get this game. It's worth it.

I am grateful for a game like this that challenges with puzzles. As a bonus the story is incredible, and not forget hilarious. The co-op mode brings these same characteristics, making it one of the best games of all time. I can't wait until portal 3!
Excelente juego, genial para jugar siempre y para jugar de fomra coperativa con tus amigos
This game is one of a kind! Just play it!!!
Best writing and voice acting of any game I've played.
once again, its lit i love it bro
valve release portal 3 its been like 9 years

If you like puzzles you will love this game
If you don't like puzzles you will love this game
The only reviews that should be considered are the ones that say "Buy Portal 2"

스토리도 너무 재미있고
게임도 재밌음
10500이 아깝지가 않음
Super  juegazo apesar de los años
There were already 2 portals in the first game. I don't understand?
Everyone should buy this and play with someone you care about dearly. Then find out if you still care about them dearly by the end. I still did, but the challenge was real xd
esta bueno el portal comprenlo melo pase en 8 horas
O jogo é muito legal de dois(só quando tu joga com alguem que sabe jogar).
só não gostei do fato de não ter o portal 3 ainda :(

I came late to the party on this one, but holy crap this game is fantastic. I find myself wanting games like this as I get older, super casual yet very gripping (Portal, Subnautica, etc). This game so far is living up to its predecessor in every way and exceeding it. If your looking for a shoot em up action heavy game, keep looking, but if you want to pop open a beverage of your choice and relax with an intriguing story, Portal 2 will do the job admirably. 10/10 in this genre.

Easily one of the best games I've ever played. Even as someone that doesn't game on PC as much as they do console, this was one of the most enjoyable plays I wish I could forget and experience for the first time again
Complex and challenging game play.  Good improvement on the original.
Sim, recomendo, é um jogo cheio de Puzzles que são cada vez mais difíceis e que estimula inteligência.
This game is so nice and whoelsome!
Great is game, the puzzles are challenging without being hard. The soundtrack is gorgeous. If you have the chance please play it.

Una jodida obra maestra de los juegos de puzles. La historia es una maravilla, GlaDos es un personaje raro pero entrañable y los niveles son inmejorables. Por si fuera poco, cuenta con un modo cooperativo que asegura muchas risas. Y que sepaís que todo esto me lo pille por 81 céntimos.
Mis dieces, Lord GabeN
Possibly my favorite game of all time.
Egyik legjobb CO-OP Game a világon :D
